metadata.title: Foto&Tech 2 Sets Crystal Clear HD LCD Screen Protector Compatible with Canon EOS Rebel T7i, 800D, Kiss X9i, 77D, 9000D Camera LCD Monitor Bubble Free Multi-Layer Anti-Smudge Coating/Easy to Apply
features: Great value for 2 sets. Multi-Layer Anti-Smudge Coating.
Protect LCD from fingerprints, smudges, scratches, and damage.
ULTRA CLEAR screen protector preserves the LCD viewing HD pictures. Camera is not included.
description: Protect for Canon EOS Rebel T7i, 800D, Kiss X9i, 77D, 9000D Camera LCD Monitor from fingerprints, smudges, scratches, and damage. It is easy to apply using a removable film applicator tab. 2 sets included.
